description.narrative: This project focuses on youth in the Mulanje, Thyolo, Phalombe, and Chiradzulo districts of Malawi and will enhance their basic economic skills, empowering them in their own communities. It will develop a curriculum which is relevant, and that enhances the employability of our students. Our students can generate enough income to sustain themselves and/or their families. The project will improve youth access to the local market through entrepreneurship training.

participating-org.narrative: Stichting The Children’s Fund of Malawi
